LanguageData.AC_PipesNotConnected: Pipes not connected to generator or tanks
LanguageData.AC_MustPlaceOnGasGeyser: This building must be placed on top of an aphrodisiac gas geyser
LanguageData.AC_PlugHoleDesc: Fill hole with dirt. WARNING: this will destroy the geyser or pond. Only do this if it is no longer useable or if you need the space.
LanguageData.AC_MustPlaceAdjacentToPipe: Gas powered buildings must be placed adjacent to gas pipes, not on top
LanguageData.AC_DeconstructGasPipesDesc: Deconstruct only gas pipes and subterranean gas pipes
LanguageData.Fluffy.GasNetwork.CommandToggleGas.Label: Toggle gas flow
LanguageData.Fluffy.GasNetwork.CommandToggleGas.Desc: Designate gas flow to be toggle on or off. A colonist will come soon to flick the switch.
LanguageData.AC_MustPlaceRoofed: This building needs to be placed in an indoors, roofed area
LanguageData.AC_LustTime:
Lust stored for: Producing {0} W of electricity No lust absorbed. The Machine Gods are hungry for lust. Switch Generator Switch Generator between a working and an inactive state Lust generator is toggled off and inactive right now
a gas pipe A fault in {0} has caused a gas explosion. A fault in {0} has caused a gas explosion which started a fire.
